codeSystems.name: CS8116DnrFnrVS
codeSystems.title: DNR og FNR fra Volven 8116
codeSystems.description: ValueSet basert på 8116 som inkluderer kun FNR og DNR

codeSystems.name: HnScheduleAndSlotTypeVS
codeSystems.title: hn-scheduleandslot-type-vs
codeSystems.description: Value set for schedule and slot type

codeSystems.name: ServiceRequestCategoryVS
codeSystems.title: ServiceRequest Category Value Set
codeSystems.description: Kode som klassifiserer tjenesten for søk, sortering og visningsformål. (flere koder vil leggest til senere)

codeSystems.name: ServiceRequestPerformerTypeVS
codeSystems.title: ServiceRequest PerformerType Value Set
codeSystems.description: Koder for valgte profesjonstyper.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTBodyStructures
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Body Structures
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all codes from [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 442083009 (Anatomical or acquired body site (body structure)).

codeSystems.name: PracticeSettingCodeValueSet
codeSystems.title: Practice Setting Code Value Set
codeSystems.description: This is the code representing the clinical specialty of the clinician or provider who interacted with, treated, or provided a service to/for the patient. The value set used for clinical specialty has been limited by HITSP to the value set reproduced from HITSP C80 Table 2-149 Clinical Specialty Value Set Definition.

codeSystems.name: Identifier Type Codes
codeSystems.title: IdentifierType
codeSystems.description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.title: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTMedicationAsNeededReasonCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Medication As Needed Reason Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all clinical findings from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

codeSystems.name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
codeSystems.title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
codeSystems.description: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.

codeSystems.name: ProcedureReasonCodes
codeSystems.title: Procedure Reason Codes
codeSystems.description: This example value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate a reason for a procedure.

codeSystems.name: RequestIntent
codeSystems.title: RequestIntent
codeSystems.description: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

codeSystems.name: RequestPriority
codeSystems.title: Request priority
codeSystems.description: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

codeSystems.name: RequestStatus
codeSystems.title: RequestStatus
codeSystems.description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

codeSystems.name: ResourceType
codeSystems.title: Resource Types
codeSystems.description: Concrete FHIR Resource Types

codeSystems.name: ServiceCategory
codeSystems.title: Service category
codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes that can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

codeSystems.name: ServiceType
codeSystems.title: Service type
codeSystems.description: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

codeSystems.name: ServiceRequestOrderDetailsCodes
codeSystems.title: Service Request Order Details Codes
codeSystems.description: An example value set of Codified order entry details concepts.  These concepts only make sense in the context of what is being ordered.  This example is for a patient ventilation order

codeSystems.name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
codeSystems.title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
codeSystems.description: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.
